com.ooyala.android

Class OoyalaAdSpot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.item.AdSpot
      • com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
        • com.ooyala.android.OoyalaAdSpot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizableItem, PlayableItem, Comparable<AdSpot>

    public class OoyalaAdSpot
extends com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
implements AuthorizableItem, PlayableItem
    Stores the info and metadata for an Ooyala Managed Adspot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OoyalaAdSpot

        public OoyalaAdSpot(int time,
            URL clickURL,
            List<URL> trackingURLs,
            String embedCode)
        Initialize an OoyalaAdSpot using the specified data
        Parameters:
        time - the time at which the VASTAdSpot should play
        clickURL - the clickthrough URL
        trackingURLs - the tracking URLs that should be pinged when this ad plays
        embedCode - the embed code associated with this OoyalaAdSpot

      • OoyalaAdSpot

        public OoyalaAdSpot(JSONObject data,
            OoyalaAPIClient api)
        Initialize the Ooyala Ad Spot
        Parameters:
        data - the metadata needed to update the Ooyala Ad
        api - the API to authorize the ad spot at a later time

        Specified by:
        update in interface AuthorizableItem
        Overrides:
        update in class com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
        Parameters:
        data - the data to use to update this AuthorizableItem
        Returns:

      • fetchPlaybackInfo

        public boolean fetchPlaybackInfo()
        Description copied from class: com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
        This method will fetch all the information required to play this AdSpot. This method should automatically get called during playback. There is no reason to call it unless you want to prefetch the data.
        Specified by:
        fetchPlaybackInfo in class com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
        Returns:
        true if success, false if failure.
